name: Currency2string
tagline: Converts a numerical value to a string currency.
body:
currency2string
===============

Use currency2string to convert your currency value (ie 2523.04) to a string value like "Two thousand five hundred twenty-three and 04/100 dollars". All you need to do the conversion is in the cc.js file in /js, but the project includes a demo page and QUnit tests.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
